1.title: Buying Shitty Buds [UNRATED]
1.lyrics:
Roll up that sack, yeah, that's some moldy shit
Bud so brown, man, it looks like it's pissed
Bought that broke ass strain, ain't no fire, just rust
Roll it tight, light it up, inhale that busted dust

Fungus in my lungs, trippin' out, brain's eatin' like a feast
Shit ain't exotic, but it got me unleashed
Bad buds make me hard, yeah, call it nasty art
From the gutter to the blunt, trauma hittin' hard

I don't need no fancy grow, no hydro flow
Just some reeky, weak-ass weed that make my world low
Smoke so bunk, feel the chaos rise
Inner city poison in my blood, no disguise

Buying shitty buds, yeah, that's my twisted cure
Puff on rotten dreams, crazy and pure
Every hit a gamble, but I'm all in, no fuss
Bad genetics' child, I'm addicted to the dust

Taste like dirt, feel the burn deep inside
Trip from the fungus, watch my sanity slide
Hard as nails, this junk keeps my spirit cracked
Smokin' on that tragedy, no way to retract

Buying shitty buds, yeah, that's my twisted cure
Puff on rotten dreams, crazy and pure
Every hit a gamble, but I'm all in, no fuss
Bad genetics' child, I'm addicted to the dust

2.title: Discord Smoke Sesh
2.lyrics:
Flicker on the screen, neon blaze,
Laughing loud in pixel haze,
Digital clouds, the chatroom flows,
Roll it up, the night explodes.

Voices crackle, a smoky beat,
Bass drops deep, can't stay in your seat,
Echoes bounce through fibre lines,
We're lighting up these tangled vines.

Gaming ghosts and killer memes,
Patch the night with electric dreams,
Drag the smoke, virtual high,
Orbit friends who never die.

Patchwork faces, glowing eyes,
Stream the vibe, no need for lies,
Discord whispers, secrets kept,
In the drift where legends slept.

Call me up, I'm rolling free,
Clouds of sound and reverie,
Stoned in frames, the world recedes,
Fuel the fire, spark the needs.

Pulse ignites, a manic grin,
Chaos waves beneath our skin,
Load the clip, no fear or stress,
Just friends and smoke and excess.

Time distorts, the pixels blend,
Reality's loose at the end,
Discord smoke, our ritual high,
Driftin' through this wired sky.

3.title: Feed The Squirrels
3.lyrics:
Yo, I'm out here grindin' where the pavement crack cracks,
Feedin' all my squirrels, yeah, they comin' back,
Fresh shelled peanuts, got 'em lined in my hand,
Inner city bandits, livin' life unplanned.

Street lights flicker, starlings start to flock,
Grackles on the corners, tryin' to take my stock,
But I hustle harder, stash nuts in my trunk,
These wild city beasts, man, they roll with the funk.

Feed the squirrels, feed the streets, gotta keep it real,
Crunchin' on the peanuts, that's the gangsta meal,
Scramble for the chips, all these birds try to steal,
But I'm king of the block with a peanut deal.

City's loud and gritty, scars on the ground,
Squirrels in the alleys, makin' mad sound,
Flippin' shells like a boss, crackin' quick, no doubt,
Inner city hustle, that's what it's about.

Feed the squirrels, feed the streets, gotta keep it real,
Crunchin' on the peanuts, that's the gangsta meal,
Scramble for the chips, all these birds try to steal,
But I'm king of the block with a peanut deal.

Starlings screamin', grackles schemin', try to swan my stash,
But I'm movin' fast, call it nutty street cash,
Shells crack loud, energy never dull,
Feed the fiends, city kings who feed the squirrels.

Feed the squirrels, feed the streets, gotta keep it real,
Crunchin' on the peanuts, that's the gangsta meal,
Scramble for the chips, all these birds try to steal,
But I'm king of the block with a peanut deal.

4.title: Gloop's World
4.lyrics:
Spin the wheel, catch the thrill, colors flash as the night stands still
Laughing faces, crazy races, in Gloop's World, we've got no chills
Strap in tight, hold on right, coaster climbs like a star in flight
Zooming past the cotton candy skies, every scream's a sweet delight

Gloop's World, where the fun never ends
Round and round, with all our friends
Bumper cars and the carousel
In Gloop's World, we cast our spell

Flicker lights and carnival sounds, spinning 'round on this merry-go-round
Racing hearts and the scent of popcorn, every step a new magic found
Jump on the Ferris wheel, feel the breeze, city glowing underneath the seas
Hand in hand through the fun and games, chasing dreams on laughter's wings

Gloop's World, where the fun never ends
Round and round, with all our friends
Bumper cars and the carousel
In Gloop's World, we cast our spell

Gloop's World, the night's alive and bright
Hold on tight, chasing stars in flight
From dawn to dusk, bright colors swirl
In our hearts, forever Gloop's World!

5.title: Hash Hole Heaven
5.lyrics:
Late night, dim light, fingers dancing slow
Paper crisp, sweet twist, memories start to flow
Roll it tight, pack it right, that sticky tar treat
Hash-holes burning low, bringing back those old beats

Soft smoke curls like whispers from a distant past
Fading echoes of laughter, how long did it last?
Every pull, every sip, colors start to blend
In this haze I find my home again, my friend

Hash-hole heaven, where the world slows down
Drifting in the glow, no need to come around
Lost in this moment, wrapped in mellow bliss
Hash-hole heaven, just a little hit of this

Golden resin, fingers stained with time
Each spark ignites the rhythm of our prime
Eyes half-closed, drifting back to those nights
Where worries dissolved in slow, hazy flights

Every ember tells a story, every breath a song
In this cloud of smoked memories, I belong
Fade away, roll again, the past and present blend
Hash-hole heaven's calling me back once again

Hash-hole heaven, where the world slows down
Drifting in the glow, no need to come around
Lost in this moment, wrapped in mellow bliss
Hash-hole heaven, just a little hit of this

Slow burn, deep turn, let the silence speak
In the curl of smoke, all the words we seek
Hash-hole heaven, where the heart finds rest
In these simple moments, life feels its best

6.title: Sweater Dog, Bed Leaps
6.lyrics:
Boundless leaps across the floor,
No sweater now, what's this for?
Dash and dart, your eyes aglow,
Onto the bed, ready to show.
Sweater dog, no wool tonight,
Coming close, pure delight.
Kisses rain in a playful flood,
Open arms, a rush of love.
Jumping high, no threads to hold,
Fluffy heart, brave and bold.
Cuddles call, belly exposed,
This wild love, freshly composed.
Sweater dog, where's your wear?
It's the bare you that we share.
Leaps and bounds, in joyful sprees,
You own the bed and hearts with ease.
Fur against sheets, a lively dance,
Every moment a sweet romance.
No sweater now, but don't mind,
In every leap, your soul we find.
Sweater dog, so wild and free,
Wrapped in love, no sweater's key.
From kisses warm to belly rubs,
Oh how we love you—sweater-less, in love!

7.title: Lung Bash
7.lyrics:
Fire in the chamber, spark the green flame
Inhale the fury, no one's to blame
Hold it tighter, lungs about to crash
Breathe in the madness, feel that LUNG BASH

Bigger hit, bigger blast, no retreat
Walls are shaking under smoky heat
Explode your lungs, let the damage reign
Brain's on fire, wired through the pain

Feel the bliss, a ruthless high
Sky's collapsing as we defy
Depths of smoke and thunder crash
Drown the world in one last LUNG BASH

No surrender, choke the haze
Ride the surge in a fiery blaze
Bong's the weapon, lungs the wall
Rise and crumble, break and fall

Take it deeper, lose control
Ash and ember scorch your soul
Big hit's terror, cut the sash
Unlock the beast with LUNG BASH

Feel the bliss, a ruthless high
Sky's collapsing as we defy
Depths of smoke and thunder crash
Drown the world in one last LUNG BASH

8.title: PH Lockout Blues
8.lyrics:
Roots screaming under alkaline skies
Well-water running heavy, truth in disguise
Leaves turning flag, yellows preaching in green
PH lockout gripping tight, breaking the scene

Pushed it too far, the balance was lost
Nutrients locked in a chemical frost
Corrected the course, broke the chains in the fight
Now they stretch tall, bathed in rebel light

PH lockout can't hold me down
I cracked the code beneath this ground
Yellow fades, green cuts the lines
Corrected, pushed, now they thrive, they climb

Fingers in dirt, fists to the sky
Rebel roots reaching, won't comply
Tasted the poison, spit it back with pride
PH lockout crushed beneath our stride

No cages for life that we grow
Breaking the lock with a thunderous flow
Yellow and green used to bleed and dive
Now they blaze, corrected, alive

PH lockout can't hold me down
I cracked the code beneath this ground
Yellow fades, green cuts the lines
Corrected, pushed, now they thrive, they climb

Bitter taste of well-water lies
Broken chains, and the rebel flies
PH lockout, you're washed away
In the green fire of a brand new day

9.title: Rent Time Blues
9.lyrics:
Woke up this morning to a leaky roof
Landlord's got excuses
That's the truth
Bills stackin' high
They don't care if I'm late
Tryna keep the lights on
But it's a heavy weight

I'm growin' green dreams in a world so mean
Tryna make a life where the grass stays clean
From the soil to the sky
My roots run deep
This hustle's my song
And it won't skip a beat

Kids need shoes
The fridge is bare
But love fills the cracks when the money's rare
Got a patch of land
Seeds in my hand
Cultivatin' a future where we all can stand

I'm growin' green dreams in a world so mean
Tryna make a life where the grass stays clean
From the soil to the sky
My roots run deep
This hustle's my song
And it won't skip a beat

Neighbors judge
But they don't know my fight
Turnin' the dark into growin' light
The law changed
But respect takes time
I'm buildin' my world
One harvest line

Late nights working
Heart's so tired
But my family's hope keeps me inspired
Through the struggle
Through the grind
I'm plantin' a future
One day it'll shine

10.title: Sweetleaf Bondage
10.lyrics:
Twisted stems beneath the moonlight's gaze
Clipped and bound in tender, harsh malaise
Veins pulse deep with resin's silent scream
Stress forged in bondage, blossoms weave their dream

Tendrils grip the primal, fiery core
Chained in sweetleaf's grasp, desire roars
Pressure turns to power, leaves entwined
In captive love, the harvest we will find

Sweetleaf bondage, choke the night with green delight
Breathe the fire, crushed tight in aching might
Stress and love collide, in shadows we belong
Bound by resin's kiss, forever strong

Fingers clasp the brittle, breaking frame
Training pain to nurture, never tame
Writhing under heat of candle's flame
Sacred torture spinning life from strain

Clipped veins bleed amber, syruped thorn's embrace
Cuffed and tied in botanical chase
Passion's pulse beats wild in captive's round
In shackled sway, true freedom's found

Sweetleaf bondage, choke the night with green delight
Breathe the fire, crushed tight in aching might
Stress and love collide, in shadows we belong
Bound by resin's kiss, forever strong

Whispered moans of leaf and earth combined
In metal chains, a sweet release defined
Love's cruel art in stress we intertwine
Through clipped limbs, our wild hearts align

Sweetleaf bondage, choke the night with green delight
Breathe the fire, crushed tight in aching might
Stress and love collide, in shadows we belong
Bound by resin's kiss, forever strong

12.title: Power of the 'Tism
12.lyrics:
Check the mind, complex grind, ain't no regular kind,
It's the 'tism, isn't it? Lights flash behind my eyes blind,
Unseen power, underestimated tower,
Checker king moves, beats drop, I own the hour.

Yeah, it's the tism, they whisper when they stare,
Doesn't phase me, I'm built for this, unaware,
They don't know or they don't care, just mimic and glare,
But inside the storm, I'm calm, fountain rare.

Power of the 'tism, it runs deep like the ocean,
Flows through circuits in my brain with vivid emotion,
Sidewalks shake when I step, thought patterns create,
That puzzle solver, never fall, always elevate.

That's the question and the answer, wrapped in a beat,
We rise like giants in this heat, no retreat,
From the shadows to the front, always stand tall,
No scripts, no chains, no backs to the wall.

Power of the 'tism, that's what they whisper when they stare,
They don't know or they don't care, I'm beyond compare,
No matter how low they go, we go with the flow,
Cause inside the storm, we got the power of the 'tism, yo.

Checker king, beats them all, always the towering fall,
Brains wired sharp, call it the 'tism call,
Energy electric, spark it, ignite the room,
Unbreakable spirit, rising from the gloom.

Yeah, it's the tism, it's the core, the heart and the flame,
Every challenge, every step, we redefine the game,
Never just obstacles, but fuel for the rise,
Power of the 'tism seen clear through these eyes.

Power of the 'tism, that's what they whisper when they stare,
They don't know or they don't care, but we're always aware,
No matter how low they go, we go with the flow,
'Cause we got the power of the 'tism, and now you know.

13.title: Zooming Shroomies
13.lyrics:
Down in the basement where the funky spores zoom,
Little alien umbrellas pop out of the gloom,
Sprouting crazy colors like a disco in June,
It's a shroomy boom-bop, a psychedelic cartoon!

I planted some spores in a jar made of glass,
Next thing I know, they're throwing a mushroom mass,
They dance and they wobble, then they giggle and sass,
Freaky little fungi throwing shade on my grass!

Freaky Shroom, take me higher than the moon,
Turn my kitchen into a rainbow cartoon,
Twist my brain up like a balloon,
Let's get weird on this mushroom tune!

They look like tiny toadstools with a party hat,
Sometimes they sing songs that sound like a cat,
When I munch on one, whoa, imagine that!
I'm riding on clouds while wearing a polka-dot hat!

Colors drip from my eyes like a melting ice cream,
The floor does the cha-cha, the walls start to gleam,
I'm floating on laughter, a translucent dream,
In the swamp of the shrooms, life's wackier than it seems!

Freaky Shroom, take me higher than the moon,
Turn my kitchen into a rainbow cartoon,
Twist my brain up like a balloon,
Let's get weird on this mushroom tune!

So if you find a patch where the wild shrooms play,
Grab a handful, get ready to sway,
We'll ride this trip in a kaleidoscope way,
Freaky Shrooms groovin' — it's a goofy buffet!

Freaky Shroom, take me higher than the moon,
Turn my kitchen into a rainbow cartoon,
Twist my brain up like a balloon,
Let's get weird on this mushroom tune!

Freaky Shroom, oh you silly shroom,
Groovin' till we pop in this psychedelic room!
